oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quilts; Art exhibitions; Invitations
Quilts; Invitation cards; Art -- Exhibitions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Invitation to the Quilts of Tennessee Exhibit at the Hunter Museum of Art features a yellow quilt on the cover and accompanying text.

The Hunter Museum of American Art focuses on American art from the Colonial period to the present day. It not only features drawings, paintings, and sculpture by many well known artists, but also includes furniture and contemporary studio glass.
